title: Fix About Us founder photo display and add short founder bio

requirements.text: Replace the About Us page founder image with the user-uploaded photo (c6a6dcf8-f14a-4450-8eef-9d5f3a00cb79.jpg) by processing it into a center-cropped 3:4 portrait and saving it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg`, ensuring it loads correctly at runtime via `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (no broken/blank image).

quotes: Use this photo file for the founder photo and a short bio also
In the about us section the founder photo ... it’s displaying the white blank with question mark

acceptanceCriteria: On the About Us page, the founder image renders normally (not a blank box / question mark) and displays the user-uploaded photo.

The image is available as a static file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` and is requested by the browser at `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` without 404.
The image is cropped/resized to exactly 300x400 (3:4) and looks center-cropped (no extreme off-center cut).

requirements.text: Add a short, generic founder bio (in English) in the About Us founder section beneath the founder title. Use the following text exactly: "I’m passionate about helping individuals and families choose the right insurance with clarity, transparency, and long-term support. My goal is to make protection simple—so you can focus on what matters most."

quotes: Add any short bio I don’t have any text to update

acceptanceCriteria: The About Us founder section displays the provided bio text below the founder role/title, with readable spacing and styling consistent with the page.
All user-facing bio text is in English.

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui/*`.
Keep the founder image referenced by the About Us page at `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (do not switch to a backend-served image).
nonGoals: Adding an admin UI for uploading/changing the founder photo or bio.
Changing other About Us content (story, mission, values, achievements) beyond the founder photo and bio.

edits: Replace the founder portrait with the uploaded photo; center-crop to a 3:4 frame at 300x400 (founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg > founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg)
